name: nbind-kinect2
description: Node bindings to kinect 2 that follow the recently-introduced webAR standard
author: John Williams

scripts.build:native: eval 'autogypi --init-gyp -p nbind -s src/kinect.cc && node-gyp configure build && copyasm . dist'
scripts.build: eval 'npm run build:native -s && npm run build:tsc -s && npm run build:typings -s'
